summary: This Mod Adds Weapons That Can Be Disenchanted To Give The Player All Enchantments
descriptionHtml:
[b][i][size=4]This Mod Adds Weapons That Can Be Disenchanted To Give You All Enchantments Including DLCS IT Also Adds 100 Soul Gem So You Can Enchant Your Weapons [/size]
[u][size=5][center]How To USE[/center][/size]
[/u][/i][/b][list]
[*][size=5][b][i]Just Extract The files to (skyrim/Data) or whatever your game folder name[/i][/b][/size]
[/list][b][i][size=5]is just extract it in the Data folder Then open Your Game And Then Open The Console Using The Button (`) In QWERTY Keyboard or (2) Using AZERTY Keyboard (Not Sure About The AZERTY) Then Type (Bat KareemE) Then Press (Enter Key) Then You Will Have All Enchantments Added With 100 Black Soul Gem ! To Remove Them Just Type In Console (Bat KareemRemoveE)[/size]
[u][size=5][center]Important[/center]
[/size][/u][size=5]This Mod Also Add A Weapon That Isn't obtainable In Game Called Beriar Heart Geis
[/size][size=6][u]Notes
[/u]
[/size][b][i][size=5]No need To install The dlcs It Won't Be problem [/size]
[/i][/b][size=6]
[/size]


[size=6]ENJOY[/size][size=5] [/size][size=5]
[/size][/i][/b][b][i] [/i][/b][b][i]
[/i][/b][size=5][b][i][list]
[/list]
[/i][/b][/size]
author: Assassinkareem
